text: Ndipo, ndithudi, alipo anthu ena pakati pa anthu a mâ€™Buku amene amakhulupirira mwa Mulungu ndi zimene zavumbulutsidwa kwa inu ndi kwa iwo ndipo amadzichepetsa pamaso pa Mulungu. Ndipo iwo sagulitsa chivumbulutso chake pamtengo wochepa ndipo malipiro awo ali kwa Ambuye wawo. Ndithudi Mulungu ndi wachangu powerengera
